instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: This is a React Native Expo project. Use <View>, <Text>, <TouchableOpacity> instead of <div>, <span>, <button>.

STYLING: Use 'nativewind' (Tailwind class names). If nativewind is not configured, prioritize standard React Native 'style={StyleSheet.create(...)}' but mimicking the Tailwind spacing/colors defined above.
NAVIGATION: Use 'expo-router' (Stack, Tabs). File structure should be in /app directory.
THEME: Implement a ThemeContext or use 'useColorScheme' from React Native to toggle between the defined Light/Dark palettes.
COMPONENTS: Do not use HTML components. Build reusable UI components (Button.js, Card.js) in /components/ui/ that accept 'className' props.
DATA-TESTID: Add 'testID' prop (React Native equivalent of data-testid) to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'Inter' for headings; use 'Manrope' or system font weight 700.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #121212.
Inputs must have at least 48px height for touch accessibility.
Gradients should be subtle (opacity 10-20%) or used only on primary actions.
Charts should use the defined 'Personal' (Blue) vs 'Business' (Green) color coding logic.
Always handle Safe Area Insets (useSafeAreaInsets) for top/bottom padding.
